Key responsibilities:

- Maintenance of the data collection information system and database for Population-Based Cancer Registration(PBCR) in Henan Province.
- Develop the annual PBCR implementation plan; provide technical support for data analysis, visualization, and reporting; deliver professional training to PBCR personnel in Henan Province; and conduct quality control of lower-level cancer registries.
- Conduct descriptive epidemiological research and evaluation of cancer screening effectiveness.
- Publish and deliver the Henan Provincial Cancer Registry Annual Report.
